LanguageData.BallistaBolt.label: Болт балісти
LanguageData.BallistaBolt.description: A steel tip attached to a long and fletched wooden pole, packing a very strong punch against scarcely armored targets.
LanguageData.BallistaBoltHeavy.label: Важкий болт балісти
LanguageData.BallistaBoltHeavy.description: Fitted with a heavy steel tip to defeat the toughest of targets.
LanguageData.BallistaBoltArmorPiercing.label: Посилений болт балісти
LanguageData.BallistaBoltArmorPiercing.description: Fitted with a streamlined and hardened steel tip to punch through armored targets.
LanguageData.MusketBall.label: куля
LanguageData.MusketBall.description: A rounded metal projectile fired from an early, black powder firearm.
LanguageData.CannonBall.label: ядро
LanguageData.CannonBall.description: A solid metal ball fired from an early, smoothbore cannon.
LanguageData.Grapeshot.label: Картеч
LanguageData.Grapeshot.description: A canister packed with numerous small projectiles, fired from early smoothbore cannons as an anti-infantry weapon.
LanguageData.BurstingShell.label: взривне ядро
LanguageData.BurstingShell.description: A crude explosive shell consisting of a hollow metal projectile filled with blackpowder to be fired from early smoothbore cannons.
LanguageData.FireShell.label: запальне ядро
LanguageData.FireShell.description: A simple incendiary shell consisting of a hollow metal projectile filled with highly flammable liquid to be fired from early smoothbore cannons.
